data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Coritiba get the game underway.
Free kick Fluminense.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Coritiba.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Coritiba.
Michel Araujo is on target to give Fluminense a 1-0 advantage.
Great play from Wellington Silva to set up the goal.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In the minute 14, Fluminense attack but Nino's header doesn't find the target.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Fluminense.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 18, Wellington Silva gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fluminense.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Nene (Fluminense) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a Coritiba throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a throw-in for Coritiba, close to Fluminense's area.
In the minute 20, Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wellington Silva is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Coritiba in Rio de Janeiro.
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 23, The home team has substituted Wellington Silva with Fernando Pacheco. Odair Hellmann is thus making his first change.
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Coritiba advance rapidly upfield but Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo blows for offside.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 25, Fluminense to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
In the minute 30, Gabriel Santana of Coritiba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Coritiba surge into the attack at Estadio do Maracana but Hugo Mouraâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 30, Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Danilo Barcelos (Fluminense) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 34, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Dodi (Fluminense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fluminense's Fernando Pacheco gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 37, Fluminense to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Coritiba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
In the minute 40, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Coritiba's Robson is on target but unsuccessful.
Robson for Coritiba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 42, Fluminense have a goal kick.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 45, Fluminense's Nene gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
At Estadio do Maracana the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Coritiba push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Robson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fluminense defence.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second half is underway in Rio de Janeiro - Fluminense with the kick-off.
Nathan is replacing Giovanni Augusto for the away team.
In the minute 46, Jorginho is making the team's first substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Thiago Lopes replacing Matheus Bueno.
Coritiba have a dangerous throw-in.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick Fluminense.
In the minute 50, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a Fluminense throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Coritiba.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Coritiba.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Fluminense.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
So close for Coritiba as Rodolfo's shot comes back off the post.
In the minute 56, Coritiba drives forward and Nathan gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Coritiba drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 58, Free kick Fluminense.
William Matheus (Coritiba) has received a yellow card from Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 60, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a second substitution, with Felippe Cardoso replacing Fred.
Goal! Fluminense extend their lead to 2-0 through Felippe Cardoso.
In the minute 61, Igor Juliao with an assist there.
In Rio de Janeiro, Robson of Coritiba is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 64, Rodolfo (Coritiba) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Martin Sarrafiore is replacing Gabriel Santana for Coritiba at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 66, Throw-in Fluminense.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Fluminense needs to be cautious. Coritiba have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 69, Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Coritiba will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Fluminense.
In the minute 71, The away team have replaced Hugo Moura with Ramon Martinez. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jorginho.
Goal! Fluminense extend their lead to 3-0 through Nino.
Matheus Ferraz instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 74, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a Coritiba throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a throw-in for Fluminense, close to Coritiba's area.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Fluminense needs to be cautious. Coritiba have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
Coritiba apply pressure at Estadio do Maracana and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Robson but the strike hits the bar!
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 80, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
Important block from the Coritiba defence as Nene fires in a strike for Fluminense.
In Rio de Janeiro, Felippe Cardoso (Fluminense) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 82, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a third substitution, with Wisney replacing Igor Juliao.
Fluminense make their fourth substitution with Ganso replacing Nene.
In the minute 82, Odair Hellmann is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Yago Felipe replacing Michel Araujo.
Coritiba are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 84, Coritiba's William Matheus has run offside.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Fluminense.
Matheus Galdezani is replacing Matheus Sales for Coritiba at Estadio do Maracana.
Coritiba pushes forward through Thiago Lopes, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 85, Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Fluminense.
Natanael (Coritiba) sees red and is sent off in Rio de Janeiro!
In the minute 87, Ganso smashes in a penalty at Estadio do Maracana. The score is now 4-0.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards the home team a throw-in.
Fluminense's Felippe Cardoso gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Coritiba are pushing forward but Martin Sarrafiore's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Fluminense!
The match is over. Final score 4-0.
